main event: A streak of fire in the sky was observed, believed to be following an aircraft.
interesting points: Several calls were received about the streak of fire in the sky., One observer reported that the fire seemed to be following an aircraft., Another observer only noticed the fire without mentioning an aircraft., Contact was made with Base Operations who confirmed an F-111 had taken off around the same time., The unusually large streak of fire was attributed to the aircraft's afterburner being activated.
sighted object: streak of fire in the sky
